Texts.Eng: Blended rotten food. The greatest invention of Dupont Dewpawnt. ^red;-^reset;5^red;% Health^reset; 15^red;s Poison^reset; ^blue;Madness Gain^reset; 3 ^red;Type: Raw Meat Dairy Dessert^reset;
Texts.Chs: 一堆混合腐烂的食物。这是杜邦露珠最伟大的发明。^red;-^reset;5 ^red;%生命值^reset;15 ^red;s毒药^reset;^blue;癫狂^reset;3 ^red;类型：生肉奶昔^reset;
